            PROJECT (LEUSER),TF056198-ACEH FOREST AND ENVIRONMENT
            PROJECT (FFI)

abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the Integrating
            Environment and Forest Protection into the Recovery and
            Future Development of Aceh Project for Indonesia is to
            ensure environmental resources and services from the Leuser
            and Ulu Masen forest ecosystems are protected during the
            post-tsunami reconstruction process. Negative measures
            include: loss of asset, loss of income, loss of land
            acquisition, and loss of livelihood. Mitigation measures
            include: a) to ensure that project benefits to local
            communities are culturally sensitive and are seen as being
            both appropriate and acceptable to the communities who are
            identified as key stakeholders in the management of forests;
            b) to ensure full consultation and participation of local
            people, identified as being most relevant to the management
            of local forests; and c) to avoid, minimize, or mitigate
            potentially adverse effects of new restrictions and
            increased enforcement of access to natural resources upon
            local communities that depend on these resources.
